metadata.title: MDverse datasets
metadata.description: Files and datasets in Parquet format related to molecular dynamics and retrieved from the Zenodo, Figshare and OSF data repositories. The file 'data_model_parquet.md' is a codebook that contains data models for the Parquet files.

creators.name: Tiemann, Johanna K. S.
